params.taskDescription:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mrow>
        <mo>(</mo>
        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
          <mfrac>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <msup>
                  <mn>7</mn>
                  <mn>9</mn>
                </msup>
              </mrow>
            </mrow>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <msup>
                  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                    <mn>10</mn>
                  </mrow>
                  <mn>5</mn>
                </msup>
              </mrow>
              <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <msup>
                  <mn>6</mn>
                  <mn>3</mn>
                </msup>
              </mrow>
            </mrow>
          </mfrac>
        </mrow>
        <mo>)</mo>
      </mrow>
      <mn>8</mn>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{\left( {\frac{{{7^9}}}{{{{10}^5} \times {6^3}}}} \right)^8}</annotation></semantics></math>
params.detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mfrac>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <msup>
          <mn>7</mn>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mn>72</mn>
          </mrow>
        </msup>
      </mrow>
    </mrow>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <msup>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mn>10</mn>
          </mrow>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mn>40</mn>
          </mrow>
        </msup>
      </mrow>
      <mo>×<!-- × --></mo>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <msup>
          <mn>6</mn>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mn>24</mn>
          </mrow>
        </msup>
      </mrow>
    </mrow>
  </mfrac>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\frac{{{7^{72}}}}{{{{10}^{40}} \times {6^{24}}}}</annotation></semantics></math>

params.taskDescription:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mrow>
        <mo>(</mo>
        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
          <mfrac>
            <mn>4</mn>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <msup>
                  <mi>a</mi>
                  <mn>9</mn>
                </msup>
              </mrow>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <msup>
                  <mi>b</mi>
                  <mn>6</mn>
                </msup>
              </mrow>
            </mrow>
          </mfrac>
        </mrow>
        <mo>)</mo>
      </mrow>
      <mn>2</mn>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{\left( {\frac{4}{{{a^9}{b^6}}}} \right)^2}</annotation></semantics></math>
params.detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mfrac>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mn>16</mn>
    </mrow>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <msup>
          <mi>a</mi>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mn>18</mn>
          </mrow>
        </msup>
      </mrow>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <msup>
          <mi>b</mi>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mn>12</mn>
          </mrow>
        </msup>
      </mrow>
    </mrow>
  </mfrac>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\frac{{16}}{{{a^{18}}{b^{12}}}}</annotation></semantics></math>
